subject: College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Tennessee Coach Derek Dooley dismissed the sophomore Darren Myles Jr. and indefinitely suspended the sophomores Greg King and Marlon Walls after a brawl early Friday.
snippet: Tennessee Coach Derek Dooley dismissed the sophomore Darren Myles Jr. and indefinitely suspended the sophomores Greg King and Marlon Walls after a brawl early Friday.
